name: Samurai's Zenith: Shifting of the Guard
name_original: Samurai's Zenith: Shifting of the Guard
description:
A mystical heartfelt adventure for those of all ages. Action based combat will slow you down at every turn, while a hidden technology lurks in the darkness. Jump in for a classic RPG adventure with many characters and abilities to uncover. Customize your combo, on your journey to explore the world. Expect to fight different enemies, talk to NPCs and trade favors for gold and items. Explore different areas, but only if you have the food to do so.

This purchase will get you all future updates and storylines. The current price will reflect the current amount of content, and will slowly be raised.
